caption.p: The time series of permafrost temperatures measured by Romanovsky and Osterkamp. Temperatures measured annually at 20 m depths in boreholes along the Dalton Highway south of Prudhoe Bay, Alaska. Locations are the following: West Dock 70 o18′N, 148 o25′W; Deadhorse 70 o11′N, 148 o27′W; Franklin Bluffs 70 o00′N, 148 o40′W; Galbraith Lake 68 o29′N, 149 o29′W; Happy Valley 69 o09′N, 148 o49′W
